document.full_text: t least eight people were killed and 17 wounded on thursday when a suicide bomber blew himself up inside a mosque in iraq's diyala province, security officials said.
document.title: suicide bomber kills 8, wounds 17 in iraq mosque
lines_and_colors: t least eight people were killed and 17 wounded on thursday when a suicide bomber blew himself up inside a mosque in iraq's diyala province, security officials said.
